__SECTION1__: Welcome to the master script to all that is MERPI.
Here you can find all the lines that MERPI can say, and edit them to your liking.

merpi_flowery: %USER pulls their head back suddenly, slamming it down on %TARGET's %T_PART without any hesitation like some sort of enraged sheep!!

merpi_normal: %USER pushes their head against %TARGET's %T_PART like a cat.
merpi_flowery: %USER leans in, pressing the side of their face to %TARGET's %T_PART, rubbing against it in a way that's similar to a cat marking its territory.
merpi_repeat: %USER pulls their head back suddenly, slamming it down on %TARGET's %T_PART without any hesitation like some sort of enraged sheep!!

merpi_flowery: %USER pulls their head back suddenly, slamming it down on %TARGET's %T_PART without any hesitation like some sort of enraged sheep!!
merpi_repeat: %USER pulls their head back suddenly, slamming it down on %TARGET's %T_PART without any hesitation like some sort of enraged sheep!!

merpi_normal: %USER pushes their head against %TARGET's %T_PART aggressively, moving it about playfully!
merpi_flowery: %USER presses their face in towards %TARGET's %T_PART, first touching it and then pushing on. It seems they're trying to playfully move the %T_PART around with their face.
%USER baps their forehead to %TARGET's %T_PART in a manner similar to how a small goat might play with another. It's hard enough to be noticable, but not really aggressive.

merpi_normal: %USER applies a gentle bit of pressure with the head on %TARGET's %T_PART.
merpi_flowery: %USER head presses down on %TARGET's %T_PART, for whatever reason applying a bit of pressure to the %T_PART to keep it next to their face.

merpi_normal: %USER suddenly donks %TARGET's %T_PART with their forehead, that hurt a little!
merpi_flowery: %USER leans back from %TARGET's %T_PART, getting just enough space for them to bull in and bap their forehead against the %T_PART aggressively!

merpi_normal: %USER puts a lot of pressure on %TARGET's %T_PART with their face!
merpi_flowery: %USER digs their forehead into %TARGET's %T_PART hard, grinding against it painfully as they let out a noise of exertion!

merpi_normal: %USER rebounds their head off of %TARGET's %T_PART exactly like a pair of mountain goats fighting!
merpi_flowery: %USER pulls their head back a full foot and change, lowers their forehead and SLAMS their face foreward towards %TARGET's %T_PART!
